original_text: On the fourth day they got up early and he prepared to leave, but the woman’s father said to his son-in-law, “Refresh yourself with something to eat; then you can go.”
korean_text: 넷째 날 아침에 일찍이 일어나 떠나고자 하매 그 여자의 아버지가 그의 사위에게 이르되 떡을 조금 먹고 그대의 기력을 돋운 후에 그대의 길을 가라 하니라

sentences.original_text: On the fourth day they got up early
but the woman's father said to his son-in-law
Refresh yourself with something to eat
